code: export var combineDateAndTime=function combineDateAndTime(date,time){var timeString=time.getHours()+':'+time.getMinutes()+':00';var year=date.getFullYear();var month=date.getMonth()+1;var day=date.getDate();var dateString="".concat(year,"-").concat(month,"-").concat(day);return new Date(dateString+' '+timeString);};export var setActivityProps=function setActivityProps(activity,user){activity.date=new Date(activity.date);activity.isGoing=activity.attendees.some(function(a){return a.userName===user.username;});activity.isHost=activity.attendees.some(function(a){return a.userName===user.username&&a.isHost;});return activity;};export var createAttendee=function createAttendee(user){return{display:user.display,isHost:false,userName:user.username,image:user.image};};
